ENABLED_DOC: Enable or disable the MQTT client connection
BROKER_HOST_DOC: MQTT broker hostname or IP address
BROKER_USERNAME_DOC: MQTT broker username (leave empty for anonymous)
BASE_TOPIC_DOC: Root topic prefix for all MQTT messages (e.g., volumio)
DEVICE_ID_DOC: Unique identifier for this Volumio instance. Leave empty to use hostname.
PUBLISH_FULL_STATE_DOC: Publish complete state as single JSON message to {base_topic}/{device_id}/status
PUBLISH_INDIVIDUAL_TOPICS_DOC: Publish each state attribute to separate topics (e.g., status/title, status/artist)
STATE_UPDATE_INTERVAL_DOC: Periodic state publish interval in seconds (0 to disable, only publish on change)
RETAIN_STATE_DOC: Set retain flag on state messages so new subscribers receive last known state
TLS_ENABLED_DOC: Use encrypted TLS/SSL connection to broker
TLS_CA_CERT_DOC: Path to CA certificate file for broker verification (optional)
TLS_CLIENT_CERT_DOC: Path to client certificate file for client authentication (optional)
TLS_CLIENT_KEY_DOC: Path to client private key file (optional)
TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED_DOC: Reject connections to brokers with invalid or self-signed certificates
CLIENT_ID_DOC: MQTT client identifier. Leave empty for auto-generated unique ID.
RECONNECT_INTERVAL_DOC: Time in milliseconds between reconnection attempts
QOS_STATE_DOC: Quality of Service level for published state messages
QOS_COMMAND_DOC: Quality of Service level for command subscriptions
PROTOCOL_VERSION_DOC: MQTT protocol version. Use 4 (v3.1.1) for most brokers including Mosquitto. Use 5 for brokers supporting MQTT 5.0 features.
GROUP_TOPIC_ENABLED_DOC: Subscribe to group command topic for multi-room control
GROUP_ID_DOC: Group identifier for multi-room commands (e.g., all, living-room)
DEBUG_ENABLED_DOC: Log detailed MQTT messages and events for troubleshooting
TEST_CONNECTION_DOC: Test MQTT broker connection with current settings
TOAST_SETTINGS_SAVED_DESC: MQTT client settings have been saved
TOAST_CONNECTION_FAILED_DESC: Failed to connect to MQTT broker
TOAST_RECONNECTING_DESC: Attempting to reconnect to MQTT broker
